cause.description:
this is to all pple who want to support the lebanese national resistance..because without this resistance..lebanon would be a part of israel!
1. Israel must stop attacking lebanon
2. Resistance is our job!
3. Lebanese National Resistance has to be supported by all the arab countries
cause.mission: show our support to the lebanese resistance and be proud of our martyrs
cause.name: SUPPORT THE LEBANESE RESISTANCE
